election_record.label: New York 1795 Governor

overview.note: The Albany Register (Albany, NY) lists 11892 votes for Robert Yates, but doing the addition of the several districts, counties, and towns gives above total.

sub_unit.name: Kings
sub_unit.note: Most sources list 185 votes for Robert Yates in Kings County but the town totals add up to 177.

sub_unit.name: Middle
sub_unit.note: The Albany Register (Albany, NY) lists 2981 votes for Robert Yates in Middle District, but doing the addition of the several counties and towns gives above total.

sub_unit.name: Dutchess
sub_unit.note: Most sources list 1031 votes for Robert Yates in Dutchess County, though the town votes given add up to 1044.

sub_unit.name: Ulster
sub_unit.note: Most sources list 1185 votes for Robert Yates in Ulster County, though the votes given add up to 1182.

sub_unit.name: Marbletown
sub_unit.note: Greenleaf's New York Journal, and Patriotic Register (New York, NY), June 3rd, lists 36 votes for Robert Yates in Marbletown, Ulster County.

sub_unit.name: Middletown
sub_unit.note: Greenleaf's New York Journal, and Patriotic Register (New York, NY), June 3rd, lists 9 votes for Robert Yates in Middletown, Ulster County.

sub_unit.name: Columbia
sub_unit.note: The Otsego Herald: or, Western Advertiser (Cooperstown, NY) lists 649 votes for John Jay in Columbia County, though the town totals add up to 656.

sub_unit.name: German Town
sub_unit.note: The Hudson Gazette (Hudson, NY), June 11th, gives 15 votes for John Jay in German Town, Columbia County.

sub_unit.name: Hudson
sub_unit.note: Greenleaf's New York Journal, and Patriotic Register (New York, NY), June 3rd, lists 126 votes for John Jay in Hudson, Columbia County.

sub_unit.name: Livingston
sub_unit.note: Greenleaf's New York Journal, and Patriotic Register (New York, NY), June 3rd, lists 41 votes for John Jay in Livingston, Columbia County.

sub_unit.name: Two
sub_unit.note: The Annals of Albany lists 46 votes for John Jay in Ward 2.

sub_unit.name: Schenectady
sub_unit.note: The Annals of Albany and The Daily Advertiser list 227 votes for Robert Yates in Schenectady.

sub_unit.name: Herkimer
sub_unit.note: Most sources give 345 votes for Robert Yates in Herkimer County, though doing the addition of the several towns gives above total.

sub_unit.name: Sangerfield
sub_unit.note: Greenleaf's New York Journal, and Patriotic Register (New York, NY) lists 20 votes for Robert Yates in Sangerfield, Herkimer County.

sub_unit.name: Montgomery
sub_unit.note: Daily Advertiser June 4th lists 576 votes for John Jay in Montgomery County

sub_unit.name: Charleston
sub_unit.note: Daily Advertiser, June 4th, and Greenleaf's New York Journal, and Patriotic Register (New York, NY), June 6th, list 124 votes for Robert Yates in Charleston, Montgomery County.

sub_unit.name: Unknown
sub_unit.note: "The Inspectors returned the votes without mentioning the towns where they were taken." The Albany Gazette (Albany, NY). June 12, 1795.

sub_unit.name: Ontario
sub_unit.note: Most sources list 400 votes for John Jay in Ontario County, but an addition of the several town totals gives the above total.

sub_unit.name: Unkown
sub_unit.note: "The Inspectors returned the votes without mentioning the towns where they were taken." The Albany Gazette (Albany, NY). June 12, 1795.

sub_unit.name: Otsego
sub_unit.note: All reporting newspapers list 455 votes for Robert Yates in Otsego County, but an addition of the totals from the several towns gives above total.

sub_unit.name: Saratoga
sub_unit.note: The Hudson Gazette (Hudson, NY), June 11, lists 781 votes for Robert Yates.

sub_unit.name: Greenfield
sub_unit.note: The Albany Gazette (Albany, NY), June 8th, The Otsego Herald: or, Western Advertiser (Cooperstown, NY) and The Albany Register (Albany, NY), June 15th, list 104 votes for Robert Yates.

sub_unit.name: Stillwater
sub_unit.note: The Daily Advertiser (New York, NY) lists 88 votes for Robert Yates.

sub_unit.name: Unknown
sub_unit.note: "The Inspectors returned the votes without mentioning the town where they were taken." The Albany Gazette (Albany, NY). June 12, 1795.
